sentences.sContent: A particular arrangement of words in poetry, such as iambic pentameter, determined by the kind and number of metrical units in a line.
sentences.sContent_eng: A particular arrangement of words in poetry, such as iambic pentameter, determined by the kind and number of metrical units in a line.
sentences.sCn: 格律：诗歌中字词的特定安排，由一行诗中韵律单位的类型和数量而定，如抑扬格五音步诗行。

sentences.sContent: He emphasizes rhythmic time, metrical harmonious beauty, and clean and tidy sentence structure so as to form a unique writing style to impress readers with changes of tidiness and terseness.
sentences.sContent_eng: He emphasizes rhythmic time, metrical harmonious beauty, and clean and tidy sentence structure so as to form a unique writing style to impress readers with changes of tidiness and terseness.
sentences.sCn: 余秋雨的散文集《文化苦旅》大胆借鉴非散文文体语言，其散文语言注重节奏的合拍、韵律的谐美、句式的整齐，构成了独特的话语风格、富于变化的整齐美。

sentences.sContent: English metrical verse mainly involves three problems:rhyme, type of translation and inheritance of style.
sentences.sContent_eng: English metrical verse mainly involves three problems:rhyme, type of translation and inheritance of style.
sentences.sCn: 英语格律诗的翻译主要涉及节奏、译文的体裁、风格的继承三大问题。

synos.tran: 测量的；韵律的；有韵律的

trans.tranOther: written in the form of poetry, with a pattern of strong and weak beats
